external_references.source_name: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025
external_references.description: Matej Havranek. (2025, February 20). DeceptiveDevelopment targets freelance developers. Retrieved October 17, 2025.

objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has utilized a PowerShell script created in the victim’s home directory named “conf.ps1” that is used to modify configuration files for AnyDesk remote services.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
